publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2027 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIsâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the following instruments be approved: The draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to Scottish Ministers etc.) (No.2) Order 2001; and The draft Consumer Protection Act 1987 (Product Liability) (Modification) (Scotland) Order 2001.
